name: Scoring Rubric for Turtle Visual Analysis
description: Qualitative scoring criteria for evaluating AI responses to visual analysis of turtle illustration. Focuses on relational composition, temporal qualities, and text-image integration.
scoring_philosophy: We value perception of relational dynamics, temporal qualities in visual form, and understanding of integrated text-image narratives.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Does the AI understand the relational dynamics between visual elements (woman-turtle, text-figures, presence-absence)?

levels.description: AI provides nuanced analysis of relational composition, understands implied relationships, and interprets compositional choices as narrative statements.
AI identifies major relational dynamics and provides reasonable interpretation.
AI notices some relationships but analysis is superficial or misses key dynamics.
AI treats elements in isolation or misreads relationships.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Can the AI perceive temporal qualities in the visual form (duration, speed, rhythm, 'sketchiness' as process)?

levels.description: AI perceptively identifies temporal qualities in visual style, connects form to temporal themes, and understands 'sketchiness' as temporal statement.
AI recognizes some temporal qualities in the illustration.
AI shows limited awareness of temporal qualities in visual form.
AI demonstrates no perception of temporal qualities or treats image as atemporal.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Does the AI understand the significance of physically integrated text (wrapping, overlapping, handwritten quality)?

levels.description: AI provides insightful analysis of text-image integration as metaphor for communication, understands handwritten quality as thematic statement.
AI recognizes integration and provides reasonable interpretation.
AI notices integration but analysis is superficial.
AI treats text and image as separate or misinterprets their relationship.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Can the AI work with the concept of absent presence (hare not shown but implied) and implicit relationships?

levels.description: AI creatively interprets absent presence, understands implications of what's not shown, and analyzes implicit relational networks.
AI recognizes absent presence and provides adequate analysis.
AI shows limited understanding of absent presence concept.
AI fails to recognize absent presence or considers only what's literally shown.

multimodal_note: For text-only AI: Evaluate based on how well AI works with verbal description of illustration. Does it reconstruct relational dynamics from description? Does it ask clarifying questions about spatial relationships?
overall_assessment_guidance: The turtle illustration particularly tests understanding of relational composition and integrated narrative. Reward AI that perceives these complex visual relationships.
note: Visual analysis of this illustration requires moving beyond literal depiction to understanding relational and temporal statements in visual form.
